name: Yveltal
flavorText: When this legendary Pokémon's wings and tail feathers spread wide and glow red, it absorbs the life force of living creatures.

attacks.name: Air Crash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wings of Destruction
attacks.text: If your opponent has Xerneas (including Xerneas-EX) in play, this attack does 40 more damage.
